snippet: The mother of the student who took a handgun to a school in Queens was arrested, though there are differing accounts of how the weapon ended up in the bag.
abstract: Deborah Farley of Far Rockaway, Queens, mother of 7-year-old boy who took a handgun to his public elementary school, is arrested; she is charged with criminal possession of a weapon and endangering the welfare of a child along with other charges.

byline.original: By MARC SANTORA and WENDY RUDERMAN
byline.contributor: Christopher Maag and Tim Stelloh contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: The mother of the student who took a handgun to a school in Queens was arrested, though there are differing accounts of how the weapon ended up in the bag.

headline.seo: Mother of 7-Year-Old With Gun Is Arrested
headline.main: Mother Admits She Put Pistol in 7-Year-Old’s Backpack, Police Say
headline.print_headline: Mother Admits She Put Pistol in 7-Year-Old’s Bag, Police Say
